text: janatte avarute akramattinre peril allahu pettenn pitikutukayanenkil bhumukhatt oru jiviyeyum avan vittekkumayirunnilla. ennal niscita avadhivare avarkk avan avasaram anuvadikkukayan. annane avarute kalavadhi vannettiyal pinne oru nimisampealum avarkkat vaikikkanavilla. neratteyakkanum sadhyamalla
